name: Extract NIB
description: NIB (Nomor Induk Berusaha) or (Business Identification Number) is the official identity of a business actor issued through the Online Single Submission (OSS) system, functioning as the basic legality of the business, replacing SIUP/TDP/API, as well as a gateway to obtain further business permits in Indonesia.
responseBody:
{
  "business_name": "example string",
  "registration_number": "example string",
  "business_type": "PT",
  "registration_date": "2026-01-11",
  "business_scale": "example string",
  "business_address": "example string",
  "city_regency": "example string",
  "province": "example string",
  "postal_code": "example string",
  "issuing_authority": "example string",
  "email": "example string",
  "business_activities_registered": [
    {
      "kbli_code": "example string",
      "activity_description": "example string",
      "activity_business_address": "example string",
      "risk_level": "example string"
    }
  ]
}

business_name.description: Legal business name or company name

registration_number.description: Business registration number or company ID

business_type.description: Type of business entity (PT, CV, UD, Individual, etc.)

issuing_authority.description: Government office that issued the registration

business_activities_registered.description: List of business activities or KBLI codes registered in business registration

name: Extract Passport
description: A passport is an official, government-issued booklet that certifies a person's identity and nationality, allowing them to travel internationally, enter foreign countries, and return to their home country.

name: Extract Identity Card
description: An identity card (KTP) is an official document, that containing personal details like name, photo, date of birth, and unique ID number, issued by a government or organization for identification, access, and services.
responseBody:
{
  "ktp_issuing_province": "example string",
  "ktp_issuing_city_regency": "example string",
  "nik": "example string",
  "full_name": "example string",
  "gender": "Male",
  "blood_type": "A",
  "date_of_birth": "2026-01-10",
  "place_of_birth": "example string",
  "address": "example string",
  "rt_rw": "example string",
  "ward_or_village": "example string",
  "subdistrict": "example string",
  "religion": "example string",
  "marital_status": "example string",
  "job_occupation": "example string",
  "citizenship": "example string",
  "valid_until": "example string",
  "issued_date": "2026-01-10",
  "issued_city_regency": "example string",
  "nationality": "example string"
}

ktp_issuing_city_regency.description: City or regency that issued the KTP

nik.description: NIK (Nomor Induk Kependudukan) - 16 digit identification number

full_name.description: Complete full name as written on KTP

rt_rw.description: RT and RW of address information

ward_or_village.description: Ward or Village (Kelurahan atau desa) of address information

issued_date.description: Date when identity card was issued

issued_city_regency.description: City or regency where identity card was issued

name: Extract Deed of Incorporation
description: A Deed of Incorporation or Akta Pendirian is the foundational legal document, prepared by a notary, that officially establishes a company (like a PT, CV, UD, etc in Indonesia) and serves as its constitution, detailing its name, objectives, capital, management structure, and the internal rules for operations, governance, and shareholder rights.
responseBody:
{
  "deed_number": "example string",
  "deed_date": "2026-01-10",
  "notary_name": "example string",
  "notary_domicile": "example string",
  "witness": [
    {
      "witness_name": "example string",
      "witness_place_of_birth": "example string",
      "witness_date_of_birth": "2026-01-10",
      "witness_address": "example string",
      "witness_identity_card_number": "example string",
      "witness_identity_card_type": "KTP"
    }
  ],
  "power_of_attorney_name": "example string",
  "power_of_attorney_place_of_birth": "example string",
  "power_of_attorney_date_of_birth": "2026-01-10",
  "power_of_attorney_address": "example string",
  "power_of_attorney_identity_card_number": "example string",
  "power_of_attorney_identity_card_type": "KTP",
  "legal_company_name": "example string",
  "legal_form": "PT",
  "legal_company_domicile": "example string",
  "business_activities": [
    {
      "kbli_code": "example string",
      "activity_description": "example string"
    }
  ],
  "authorized_capital": 0,
  "issued_capital": 0,
  "paid_up_capital": 0,
  "list_shareholders": [
    {
      "identity_card_number": "example string",
      "identity_card_type": "KTP",
      "number_of_shares": 0,
      "share_class": "example string",
      "total_amount_of_number_of_shares": 0,
      "shareholder_address": "example string",
      "shareholder_place_of_birth": "example string",
      "shareholder_date_of_birth": "2026-01-10"
    }
  ],
  "list_management": [
    {
      "identity_card_number": "example string",
      "identity_card_type": "KTP",
      "role": "example string",
      "management_address": "example string",
      "management_place_of_birth": "example string",
      "management_date_of_birth": "2026-01-10"
    }
  ]
}

notary_name.description: Name of the notary issuing the deed (including the title)

notary_domicile.description: Domicile of the notary issuing the deed

witness.description: Witness of the notary issuing the deed

witness[].witness_identity_card_number.description: Witness identity card number (KTP, Passport, etc)

power_of_attorney_place_of_birth.description: Power of attorney place of birth

power_of_attorney_date_of_birth.description: Power of attorney date of birth

power_of_attorney_identity_card_number.description: Power of attorney identity card number

power_of_attorney_identity_card_type.description: Power of attorney identity card type

legal_company_name.description: Official registered company name as stated in the deed

legal_company_domicile.description: Official registered domicile as stated in the deed

business_activities.description: List of business activities or KBLI codes

list_shareholders.description: List of shareholders in the deed

list_shareholders[].total_amount_of_numb.description: Total amount of number of shares

list_management.description: List of management stated in the deed

list_management[].role.description: Management role stated in the deed
